title: Fragment With Factory Stamp, ca. 1830
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave foundation; block registration marks visible
inscribed: "No 134 Oxford St MILES & EDWARDS' with crown within frame in black. On either side of this mark is a block printed anthemion frieze in red. The beginning of a Patent mark in black is just visible. "H.E" in yellow (for printer of yellow). Handwritten in ink (faded) between pattern and mark "25 1/2 yds".
dimensions: Warp: 28.5cm (11 1/4in). Weft: 65 cm (25 3/4in.) One selvedge present.
description: Mark faces in opposite direction to direction of pattern. Pattern of polychrome bunches of flowers on natural.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment With Factory Stamp, ca. 1830.
ca. 1830. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave foundation; block registration marks visible. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-22.
